trans-unit.source: Provides runtime versions 1.0 and 1.1 support for reading configuration sections and common configuration settings.
trans-unit.target: Gir runtime versjon 1.0 og 1.1 støtte for lesing konfigurasjonsdeler og vanlige konfigurasjonsinnstillingene.

trans-unit.source: Using the static methods and properties of the ConfigurationSettings type is the recommended method for reading configuration information at runtime for versions 1.0 and 1.1 applications.
trans-unit.target: Ved hjelp av statiske metoder og egenskaper av typen ConfigurationSettings er den anbefalte metoden for lesing av konfigurasjonsinformasjon under kjøring for versjon 1.0 og 1.1 programmer.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The ConfigurationSettings class provides backward compatibility only.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For ConfigurationSettings klassen gir bare bakoverkompatibilitet.

trans-unit.source: For new applications you should use the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager> class or <xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager> class instead.
trans-unit.target: For nye apper må du bruke den <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager>klassen eller <xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager>klasse i stedet.</xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager> </xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager>

trans-unit.source: To use these two classes, you must add a reference in your project or application to the System.Configuration namespace.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil bruke disse to klasser, må du legge til en referanse i prosjektet eller programmet navneområdet System.Configuration.

trans-unit.source: Gets a read-only <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"></xref> of the application settings section of the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Henter en skrivebeskyttet <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"> </xref> for innstillinger applikasjonsdelen i konfigurasjonsfilen.

trans-unit.source: The `appSettings` section element of the configuration file contains a series of name/value pairs that your application can use for any purpose.
trans-unit.target: Den `appSettings` delelementet i konfigurasjonsfilen inneholder en serie med navn/verdi-parene som programmet kan bruke en.

trans-unit.source: This method is deprecated and is maintained for backward compatibility.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er avskrevet og opprettholdes for bakoverkompatibilitet.

trans-unit.source: Please use the GetSection method instead.
trans-unit.target: Bruk GetSection-metoden i stedet.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSettings> class provides backward compatibility only.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Den <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSettings>klassen gir bare bakoverkompatibilitet.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSettings>

trans-unit.source: You should use the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager> class or <xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager> class instead.
trans-unit.target: Du må bruke den <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager>klassen eller <xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager>klasse i stedet.</xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager> </xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager>

trans-unit.source: A read-only <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"></xref> of the application settings section from the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: En skrivebeskyttet <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"> </xref> for innstillinger applikasjonsdelen i konfigurasjonsfilen.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object for the passed configuration section name and path.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer den <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"> </xref> objekt for overførte delen navn og bane.

trans-unit.source: This method is deprecated and is maintained for backward compatibility.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er avskrevet og opprettholdes for bakoverkompatibilitet.

trans-unit.source: Please use the GetSection method instead.
trans-unit.target: Bruk GetSection-metoden i stedet.

trans-unit.source: A configuration name and path, such as "system.net/settings".
trans-unit.target: Et navn og bane, for eksempel "system.net/settings".

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object for the passed configuration section name and path.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"> </xref> objekt for overførte delen navn og bane.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSettings"></xref> class provides backward compatibility only.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSettings"> </xref> klassen gir bare bakoverkompatibilitet.

trans-unit.source: You should use the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager"></xref> class or <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager"></xref> class instead.
trans-unit.target: Du må bruke den <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager"> </xref> klassen eller <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager"> </xref> klasse i stedet.

trans-unit.source: Unable to retrieve the requested section.
trans-unit.target: Kan ikke hente den forespurte delen.
